QUERY_CONFIG.query: SELECT count(*) as NB, STATUS_DATE FROM MUREXDB.STPDOC_ENTRY_TABLE where STPDOC_REF_TYPE = 'DEAL' AND XMLFLOW_STATUS = '~SYS_ERROR~' group by STATUS_DATE
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT STPDOC_REF) as NB, STATUS_DATE FROM MUREXDB.STPDOC_ENTRY_TABLE WHERE XMLFLOW_STATUS = '11655' AND STPDOC_REF_TYPE = 'DEAL' group by STATUS_DATE
SELECT COUNT(STPDOC_REF) as NB, STATUS_DATE FROM MUREXDB.STPDOC_ENTRY_TABLE WHERE XMLFLOW_STATUS = '11987' AND STPDOC_REF_TYPE = 'DEAL' group by STATUS_DATE
